column4: I can't install Ubuntu on my hd using Wubi on WinXP, it keeps freezing up in the middle of the iso file download, even after I tell Windows Firewall to unblock the program
can someone help me with this one please?
it keeps freezing in the middle of the iso file download chef4
are you trying to do a dual boot or something?
yeah chef4
if you cant downlooad linux you have other issues
there are tons of mirrors
shoe a nother mirrpos

I keep getting this message that Windows Firewall is blocking the iso file from being downloaded, I click on the link to unblock it, and then the program just hangs there like forever, until I click on 'cancel'
disable you firewall
how do I do that chef4? :(
sorry I'm kindof a firewall newbie.
are you running windows?
yeah chef4 winXP
what do I do, go into Ctrl Panel?
ok to disable windows firewall you have to go into control panel --> windows firewall --> off
ahhhh I see, that shouldn't be too hard
thanx chef4
if you have other antivirus software disable that tolo
rememeber to turn it back on after you done download a
ok chef4, I'll shut down all windows except the wubi window
thanx 4 the help!  Blessed Be everyone!
its pretty common to have problem with you firewall when downloading things especially like torrents and stuff
